title: compression schemes
extract: DATA COMPRESSION meaning - DATA COMPRESSION definition - DATA COMPRESSION explanation. ... Lossless compression reduces bits by identifying and eliminating statistical redundancy. No information is lost in lossless compression. Lossy compression reduces bits by removing unnecessary or less important information.Sep 19, 2016
